title: Another 820-00840 booting to update screen
message: This had extremely minimal liquid-damage around U4200 and was booting to the update screen before we touched it. I cleaned up and reflowed U4200. It still just boots to the critical update page. Will boot fine in safe mode. Everything appears to be fully functional, but in safe mode the touch bar is disabled so I'm not sure about that. Battery is charged and fully functional. SSD is working normally. Any ideas?

title: Another 820-00840 booting to update screen
message: Did you try all the options from the old post about critical update?

title: Another 820-00840 booting to update screen
message: Yeah, nothing. I'm convinced this has nothing to do with networking issues WHEN there was damage to the board. I think it's just an issue with the board that needs to be fixed. My patience for this issue is extremely limited. Letting this one go.
